meaningMnemonic: There is a <radical>lantern</radical> on top of a <radical>knife</radical> in the <radical>dirt</radical>. You walk up to take the knife and lantern when you realize it's just a <kanji>model</kanji>. It all looked real from far away, but now that you're up close you can see none of it is real.
readingMnemonic: You touch the <kanji>model</kanji> and see that it's made of <reading>ca</reading>ke (けい)! Someone really into lanterns and knives must have been given this model cake as a birthday present! Though they left it out here so they probably didn't like it.
